sentences.en: a hardy breed of sheep
sentences.cn: 适应力强的绵羊品种

sentences.en: a rare breed of miniature horses
sentences.cn: 一种罕见的小矮马

sentences.en: Eagles breed during the cooler months of the year.
sentences.cn: 鹰在一年中较凉爽的季节交配繁殖。

sentences.en: Education and experience breed a breadth of vision and understanding to him.
sentences.cn: 教育和经历使他眼界开阔.

sentences.en: health-service staff are a breed apart with their dedication to duty.
sentences.cn: 保健服务行业从业人员以其忠于职守的态度而显得与众不同。

sentences.en: If they are unemployed it's bound to breed resentment.
sentences.cn: 如果他们失去工作，一定会产生怨恨。

sentences.en: Inequality and poverty breed class conflict.
sentences.cn: 不平等和贫困滋长阶级对抗.

sentences.en: Maggots breed in cheese.
sentences.cn: 蛆在乳酪里孳生.

sentences.en: Rabbits propagate [ breed ] rapidly.
sentences.cn: 兔子 繁殖 迅速.

sentences.en: Real cowboys are a dying breed (=  not many exist anymore  ) .
sentences.cn: 真正的牛仔现在已非常少见。

sentences.en: Scholars are a quiet breed.
sentences.cn: 学者们大都沉默寡言.

sentences.en: Society’s obsession with sex has bred a generation of unhappy children.
sentences.cn: 纵欲的社会生养了一代不幸的儿童。

sentences.en: Spaniels are my favourite breed of dog.
sentences.cn: 西班牙猎犬是我最喜欢的犬种。

sentences.en: the country's dying breed of elder statesmen.
sentences.cn: 正在淡出人们视野的前辈政治家。

sentences.en: the country's dying breed of elder statesmen.
sentences.cn: 正在淡出人们视野的前辈政治家。

sentences.en: The new breed is under observation.
sentences.cn: 新品种正在观察中.

sentences.en: The parents are trying to breed their son a musician.
sentences.cn: 这对父母尽力要把儿子培养成为音乐家.

sentences.en: The whales migrate some 6,000 miles to breed and calve in the warm lagoons.
sentences.cn: 鲸会迁移6,000海里左右，到温暖的环礁湖生殖繁衍。

sentences.en: They breed fish in the reservoir.
sentences.cn: 他们在水库养鱼.

sentences.en: They breed twice yearly.
sentences.cn: 它们每年繁殖两次.

sentences.en: This breed of horses is both tall and heavily grown.
sentences.cn: 这种马既高且大.

sentences.en: Where there is water nearby, make a special effort to breed fish.
sentences.cn: 守着水的地方要多养鱼.

words.tran_cn: 饲养员；繁殖者；起因；增殖反应堆
生产；培育；使…繁殖（breed的ing形式）

phrases.phrase: breed a scab on (one's) nose 或 breed scabs on (one's) nose &I{【区域的】}
breed up a storm&I{【新英格兰】}
what's bred in the bone will come out in the flesh

trans.tran_en: a type of animal that is kept as a pet or on a farm
if animals breed, they  mate  in order to have babies
if animals breed, they  mate  in order to have babies

trans.tran_cn: 造成， 引起；教养， 抚养；饲养
trans.tran_en: to keep animals or plants in order to produce babies or new plants, especially ones with particular qualities
